column1: '''Jerry VanderStelt''' is a fantasy and science fiction artist. The works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]] have inspired his artwork. On license of [[New Line Cinema]] he has created many drawings of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. His art is produced by '''VanderStelt Studio''', a company he runs himself.<ref>{{webcite
